title: Will the 2nd wave (In December) ship before Christmas?
body: I really want to get a copy of this before Christmas to play with my family but I can't help but have this sinking feeling in my stomach that i'm going to miss the window for the first wave of copies, hopefully I can catch the second wave but I want to know if they will ship before Christmas or is it still unknown?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=AMxvhsRt,discussion-id=AiyaJdLQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-24T03:50:15.909+0000)

> COINCIDENCE? I THINK NOT!

You missed the second wave but you got me :P

It's still unknown.  I hope so.  I think every manufacturer in the world sees the value of getting their goods out by Christmas.  But there are so many things that could happen that are out of our control.  A good example is how long the units will wait in customs.
